code: import axiosClient from'./axiosClient';const MessengerAPI={getMessage:query=>{const url="/messenger/".concat(query);return axiosClient.get(url);},postMessage:query=>{const url="/messenger/send".concat(query);return axiosClient.post(url);},postConversation:query=>{const url="/messenger/conversation".concat(query);return axiosClient.post(url);}};export default MessengerAPI;
